content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item and no other words.(Notice that for the same ring map, if the number of steps in the route is doubled, the distance from the starting point to the endpoint should also be doubled.)

You have been given a circular path consisting of 10 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a ladle. Moving in a clockwise direction from the ladle, the elements on the path are a collie, a grey whale, a lens cap, a bikini, a solar thermal collector, an overskirt, a notebook computer, a paddle, and a horse-drawn vehicle. Starting from the grey whale, you move around the ring by 1 step in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 3 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 8 steps in a clockwise direction. What will you find?

You have been given a circular path consisting of 10 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a ladle. Moving in a clockwise direction from the ladle, the elements on the path are a collie, a grey whale, a lens cap, a bikini, a solar thermal collector, an overskirt, a notebook computer, a paddle, and a horse-drawn vehicle. Starting from the grey whale, you move around the ring by 2 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 6 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 16 steps in a clockwise direction. What will you find?

notebook计算机无法生成中文字符，正确答案应为“notebook计算机”替换为“笔记本计算机”

按照您的要求，正确且仅包含物品名称的答案为：

笔记本计算机
